0193feed-2940-71ba-9fc5-64122b4b79ff.name: yours truly hotel
0193feed-2940-71ba-9fc5-64122b4b79ff.arrival: You arrive at the Yours Truly hotel, site of the first ever DistrictCon!
0193feed-2940-71ba-9fc5-64122b4b79ff.description: You look around the lobby. The decor is pretty cool, and there's a DistrictCon sign and registration table to your right. A *volunteer* stands behind it. In front of you is the elevator to the *conference center*. Behind you is the door out onto New Hampshire Ave NW and all of Washington, DC!

019447f9-b219-73d6-8d7e-bcec12d2af9c.name: conference center
019447f9-b219-73d6-8d7e-bcec12d2af9c.arrival: You take the elevator up to the conference center.
019447f9-b219-73d6-8d7e-bcec12d2af9c.description: There are lots of people in the conference center, some just walking through, some standing around talking. You see a hallway that leads to some of the conference rooms.

0193feed-5326-7672-b1fd-c08658c45ac6.name: white house
0193feed-5326-7672-b1fd-c08658c45ac6.arrival: You arrive at the north side of the gates of the White House, near Lafayette park.
0193feed-5326-7672-b1fd-c08658c45ac6.description: This is the White House where the President lives and works.

0193feee-0b82-704a-aeba-ce40029e7b7e.name: metro station
0193feee-0b82-704a-aeba-ce40029e7b7e.arrival: You are at a metro station, lucky for you, it's a free-ride weekend!
0193feee-0b82-704a-aeba-ce40029e7b7e.description: This is a typical Washington, DC metro station. You can get anywhere in the city from here!
